This function mitigates gas exhaustion issues by allowing batch processing within a specified limit.","_startMilestoneId":"Starting milestone ID from which to begin claims."}},"createDispute(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Initiates a dispute status for a milestone that can be activated by the client or contractor when they disagree on the previously submitted work.","params":{"_contractId":"ID of the milestone where the dispute occurred.","_milestoneId":"ID of the milestone where the dispute occurred. This function can only be called if the milestone status is either RETURN_REQUESTED or SUBMITTED."}},"deposit(uint256,address,(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes32,uint8,uint8)[])":{"details":"This function allows the initialization of multiple milestones in a single transaction,     either by creating a new contract or adding to an existing one. This function ensures that the total resolution amounts do not exceed the deposited amount and adjusts the status of the milestone based on the dispute outcome.","_milestoneId":"ID of the milestone withdrawal."}],"Escrow__InvalidWinnerSpecified()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the specified winner is invalid."}],"Escrow__NoDepositsProvided()":[{"notice":"Error for when no deposits are provided in a when no return is requested."}],"Escrow__NotApproved()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the action is not approved."}],"Escrow__NotEnoughDeposit()":[{"notice":"Thrown when there is not enough deposit."}],"Escrow__NotSetFeeManager()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the fee manager is not set."}],"Escrow__NotSupportedPaymentToken()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the payment token is not supported."}],"Escrow__OutOfRange()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the specified ID is out of the valid range for the contract."}],"Escrow__ResolutionExceedsDepositedAmount()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the resolution exceeds the deposited amount."}],"Escrow__ReturnNotAllowed()":[{"notice":"Thrown when return is not allowed."}],"Escrow__TooManyMilestones()":[{"notice":"Error for when too many deposit entries are provided, exceeding the allowed limit for a single transaction."}],"Escrow__UnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when an unauthorized account attempts an action."}],"Escrow__UnauthorizedReceiver()":[{"notice":"Thrown when the receiver is unauthorized."}],"Escrow__UnauthorizedToApproveDispute()":[{"notice":"Thrown when unauthorized account tries to approve dispute."}],"Escrow__UnauthorizedToApproveReturn()":[{"notice":"Thrown when unauthorized account tries to approve return."}],"Escrow__ZeroAddressProvided()":[{"notice":"Thrown when a zero 8c0c19024fd85208508656164f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f66a271b4ebee7032c91876874f54773a35955249b912621c7321502a365d417","dweb:/ipfs/QmVkYb24oB8BKCebkrQG6eNubX55eUDsyFF7vNTepFjLPi"]},"src/EscrowMilestone.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ebb4c4cb541dce0adb2cb6227fffac39b3152fa24f2742c14cb748f2fb11b93","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3fcf4ffecc08440e3d3f8c99060f309fcb0e645cb5dc4bd0456c1373f58d3b27","dweb:/ipfs/QmW9FKA2iYbhaTda8NvX5DeZwkhcGwAJDvZcq64jgsQLGg"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrow.sol":{"keccak256":"0x280ce3ecb12e30b495417535ced2579877a7db7fed91bf83534869657a36ae0a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a016b34ecbe4dc1fb695742e4fc92b4db188a3875c2fc9e7756a3a3bbe93da99","dweb:/ipfs/QmeyC29MGt64YPNBRMafbTag4JJQNTePX4tBrcNiJF4Nf8"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowAdminManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5064f56587166c48dbfdf278f1e86d70576812a67ac21ac7b9404ea17cca9ce5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1cccfcc7c21277cbbb31c6fa7441739e6236d00b6e85ce283550582946e6a8f6","dweb:/ipfs/QmXWUZMCa1AjXJcmc9nCTfNEppGeErG2JoXywVd6CknySG"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowFeeManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa45d25f162cc477514d568ea15373a10cc72b6adf4b8ae8c32db3a3aefc59fb9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5b0a124af72952549d6b073bec0b42d1fa4a271b15dec3cc31e582ee11cf382a","dweb:/ipfs/QmeruJheWkboppnSPQMiXSgzaGamD7NKRo7yMJP9x9asfk"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowMilestone.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb587dbec4c33a6f960bca63e22083b4d0d6da935651b3700975c4d3e3129fa82","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://84bd15004ad485968b47ce34a64a554463d7756ccf16ef885ea9505293978ab9","dweb:/ipfs/QmcZBJCuyPGy6GqM1qjfXSnNAXcEWgvqeMadNzAQa6FWwc"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd8246f3f31f806e9433c066c51fb494143060bcfe48715365c0161d8535a543d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://635efc148c6c750fbd0567719ef035cc7b405877f9ba228ce8ffd8ef5694e735","dweb:/ipfs/QmTK9D8kswEWieHQ151TNbSidpMzbGTFFDRHMAtf53Lr4H"]},"src/libs/ERC1271.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb92415a8c6d00741ab2b05ae6c81ede55a1b5aaeb5db41097a026e017b9889fa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6740580ed8e1ff26b0ce72b954e1aca9b1e025795a9f6e4223c2c7e6942741a5","dweb:/ipfs/QmQpSBYwxDRuDQKtYiDnW1TxnppoDw5BUW4ERHDQKEwh1s"]},"src/libs/Enums.sol":{"keccak256":"0x702d845d8c5664f8a656cf0677f79938eac88efb07ccd8de2049d1e5ca4ba48a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8b61afd54090312927f91eeabfb447ee9554842bf9adee1463e5b76e01531221","dweb:/ipfs/QmXYEcPQDx43E47Vq17XguwsYXpGdTosYpDjjSTjz7Yjop"]}},"version":1}

approve(uint256,uint256,uint256,address).details: This function allows the client or an authorized admin to approve work submitted for a milestone, specifying the amount to be released.

params._amountApprove: Amount to be released for the milestone.
params._contractId: ID of the contract containing the milestone.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone within the contract to be approved.
params._receiver: Address of the contractor receiving the approved amount.

approveReturn(uint256,uint256).details: This changes the status of the milestone to allow the client to withdraw their funds.

params._contractId: ID of the milestone for which the return is approved.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone for which the return is approved.

cancelReturn(uint256,uint256,uint8).details: Allows reverting the milestone status from RETURN_REQUESTED to an active state.

params._contractId: The unique identifier of the milestone for which the return is being cancelled.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone for which the return is being cancelled.
params._status: The new status to set for the milestone, must be ACTIVE, SUBMITTED, APPROVED, or COMPLETED.

claim(uint256,uint256).details: Handles the transfer of approved amounts to the contractor while adjusting for any applicable fees.

params._contractId: ID of the contract containing the milestone.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone from which funds are to be claimed.

claimAll(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Allows the contractor to claim for multiple milestones in a specified range.

params._contractId: ID of the contract from which to claim funds.
params._endMilestoneId: Ending milestone ID until which claims are made. This function mitigates gas exhaustion issues by allowing batch processing within a specified limit.
params._startMilestoneId: Starting milestone ID from which to begin claims.

createDispute(uint256,uint256).details: Initiates a dispute status for a milestone that can be activated by the client or contractor when they disagree on the previously submitted work.

params._contractId: ID of the milestone where the dispute occurred.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone where the dispute occurred. This function can only be called if the milestone status is either RETURN_REQUESTED or SUBMITTED.

deposit(uint256,address,(address,uint256.details: This function allows the initialization of multiple milestones in a single transaction,     either by creating a new contract or adding to an existing one. Uses the adjustable limit `maxMilestones`     to prevent gas limit issues.

params._contractId: ID of the contract for which the deposits are made; if zero, a new contract is initialized.
params._milestones: Array of details for each new milestone.
params._paymentToken: The address of the payment token for the contractId.

getContractorDataHash(bytes,bytes32).details: This external function computes the hash value for the contractor data using the provided data and salt.

params._salt: Salt value for generating the hash.

returns._0: Hash value of the contractor data.

params._contractId: The contract ID for which to retrieve the milestone count.

returns._0: The number of milestones associated with the given contract ID.

params._adminManager: Address of the adminManager contract of the escrow platform.
params._client: Address of the client initiating actions within the escrow.

params._hash: Hash of the data to be signed.
params._signature: Signature byte array associated with the hash.

returns._0: The magic value if the signature is valid, otherwise 0xffffffff.

refill(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Allows a client to add funds to a specific milestone, updating the total deposit amount for that milestone.

params._amountAdditional: The additional amount to be added to the milestone's budget.
params._contractId: ID of the contract containing the milestone.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone within the contract to be refilled.

requestReturn(uint256,uint256).details: The milestone must be in an eligible state to request a return (not in disputed or already returned status).

params._contractId: ID of the deposit for which the return is requested.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone for which the return is requested.

resolveDispute(uint256,uint256,uint8,uin.details: Handles the resolution of disputes by assigning the funds according to the outcome of the dispute. Admin intervention is required to resolve disputes to ensure fairness.

params._clientAmount: Amount to be allocated to the client if Split or Client wins.
params._contractId: ID of the milestone where the dispute occurred.
params._contractorAmount: Amount to be allocated to the contractor if Split or Contractor wins. This function ensures that the total resolution amounts do not exceed the deposited amount and adjusts the status of the milestone based on the dispute outcome.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone where the dispute occurred.
params._winner: Specifies who the winner is: Client, Contractor, or Split.

setMaxMilestones(uint256).details: This limit helps prevent gas limit issues during bulk operations and can be adjusted by the contract admin.

params._maxMilestones: The new maximum number of milestones.

submit(uint256,uint256,bytes,bytes32).details: This function allows the contractor to submit their work details for a milestone.

params._contractId: ID of the contract containing the milestone.
params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone to submit work for.

transferClientOwnership(address).details: Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.

params._newAccount: The address to which the client ownership will be transferred.

transferContractorOwnership(uint256,uint.details: Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.

params._contractId: The identifier of the contract for which contractor ownership is being transferred.
params._milestoneId: The identifier of the milestone for which contractor ownership is being transferred.
params._newAccount: The address to which the contractor ownership will be transferred.

updateAdminManager(address).details: Restricts the function to be callable only by the current owner of the admin manager.

params._adminManager: The new address of the admin manager contract.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: Withdrawal depends on the milestone being approved for refund or resolved.

params._contractId: The identifier of the contract from which to withdraw funds.
params._milestoneId: The identifier of the milestone within the contract from which to withdraw funds.

approve(uint256,uint256,uint256,address).notice: Approves a milestone's submitted work, specifying the amount to release to the contractor.

approveReturn(uint256,uint256).notice: Approves the return of funds, which can be called by the contractor or platform admin.

cancelReturn(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Cancels a previously requested return and resets the milestone's status.

claim(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows the contractor to claim the approved amount for a milestone within a contract.

claimAll(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Claims all approved amounts by the contractor for a given contract.

createDispute(uint256,uint256).notice: Creates a dispute over a specific milestone.

deposit(uint256,address,(address,uint256.notice: Creates multiple milestones for a new or existing contract.

getContractorDataHash(bytes,bytes32).notice: Generates a hash for the contractor data.

getMilestoneCount(uint256).notice: Retrieves the number of milestones for a given contract ID.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Returns whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.

maxMilestones().notice: The maximum number of milestones that can be processed in a single transaction.

refill(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Adds additional funds to a milestone's budget within a contract.

requestReturn(uint256,uint256).notice: Requests the return of funds by the client for a specific milestone.

resolveDispute(uint256,uint256,uint8,uin.notice: Resolves a dispute over a specific milestone.

setMaxMilestones(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum number of milestones that can be added in a single transaction.

submit(uint256,uint256,bytes,bytes32).notice: Submits work for a milestone by the contractor.

transferClientOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the client account to a new account.

transferContractorOwnership(uint256,uint.notice: Transfers ownership of the contractor account to a new account for a specified contract.

updateAdminManager(address).notice: Updates the address of the admin manager contract.

updateRegistry(address).notice: Updates the registry address used for fetching escrow implementations.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws funds from a milestone under specific conditions.
